original_text: All these things happened at a place east from the Jordan River. It was a village called Bethany. John was baptizing people there.
korean_text: 이 일은 요한이 세례 베풀던 곳 요단 강 건너편 베다니에서 일어난 일이니라

sentences.original_text: All these things happened at a place
sentences.korean_translation: 이 모든 일들이 한 장소에서 일어났습니다

sentences.original_text: It was a village called Bethany.

sentences.korean_translation: 요한이 그곳에서 사람들에게 세례를 주고 있었습니다
